医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
了解年轻母亲在育儿过程中面临的风险伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究报告发现，20 岁以下的母亲在生下第一个孩子后的 10 年内参与护理程序的风险最大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Understanding-the-risks-for-young-mothers-in-child-care-proceedings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Understanding-the-risks-for-young-mothers-in-child-care-proceedings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=549b31d9-c486-4eaf-869a-70a9a0fd4900 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 00:16:00 -0400 Understanding the risks for young mothers in child care proceedings
研究让患者放心索马鲁肽的安全性宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，服用减肥药物索马鲁肽不会增加没有已知重大精神健康障碍的人出现抑郁症状、自杀想法或自杀行为的风险。本周《美国医学会杂志内科》。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Study-reassures-病人-about-semaglutide-safety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Study-reassures-病人-about-semaglutide-safety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8b5cfd4-33cf-46ae-875d-a2667df714f1 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 00:06:10 -0400 Study reassures patients about semaglutide safety
深夜打电话的习惯会导致青少年压力和焦虑网络欺凌、智能手机的使用、睡眠不足和心理健康状况不佳，再加上网络欺凌、智能手机的使用，就会导致青少年崩溃。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Late-night-phone-habits-contribute-to-teen-stress-and-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Late-night-phone-habits-contribute-to-teen-stress-and-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cb6836e-ea43-4fc9-9938-8d2067439114 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 23:59:19 -0400 Late-night phone habits contribute to teen stress and anxiety
不准确的数据阻碍了儿科公平倡议旨在解决儿科患者公平问题的密歇根三家医院的领导者希望从检查对于识别潜在不平等现象至关重要的数据开始。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Inaccurate-data-stalls-pediatric-equity-initiatives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Inaccurate-data-stalls-pediatric-equity-initiatives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34f21cab-6bb3-49a8-8642-86f60ff9e156 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 23:49:00 -0400 Inaccurate data stalls pediatric equity initiatives
研究表明曲鲁唑如何针对与阿尔茨海默病相关的早期改变在阿尔茨海默病研究的最新进展中，奥本大学的科学家们研究了一种新药，曲鲁唑，它可以防止导致阿尔茨海默病小鼠模型记忆丧失和认知能力下降的大脑变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-shows-how-troriluzole-can-target-early-stage-alterations- Associated-with-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-shows-how-troriluzole-can-target-early-stage-alterations- Associated-with-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e6317de-c6d0-4051-91f6-2e46e8789d6e Tue, 03 Sep 2024 23:12:36 -0400 Study shows how troriluzole can target early-stage alterations associated with Alzheimer's
CDK4/6 抑制剂有望用于儿科高级别神经胶质瘤治疗根据 Dana-Farber 癌症研究所和该研究所的最新研究，CDK4/6 抑制剂已被 FDA 批准用于治疗其他形式的癌症，在治疗儿科高级神经胶质瘤的一种亚型方面显示出希望的早期迹象伦敦癌症研究中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/CDK46-inhibitors-show-promise-for-pediatric-high-grade-glioma-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/CDK46-inhibitors-show-promise-for-pediatric-high-grade-glioma-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=857c9dcc-bb84-42e7-a447-6bd7ed6b34bd Tue, 03 Sep 2024 23:08:25 -0400 CDK4/6 inhibitors show promise for pediatric high-grade glioma treatment
细胞过程的发现可能会影响对癌症和衰老的理解加州大学默塞德分校的研究人员利用果蝇揭示了许多生物体常见的细胞过程，该过程可能会极大地影响对癌症和衰老的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Discovery-of-cellular-process-could-impact-the-understanding-of-cancer-and-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Discovery-of-cellular-process-could-impact-the-understanding-of-cancer-and-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d607d4c-11f5-4ee2-9fd3-db1a6e38b99b Tue, 03 Sep 2024 23:06:21 -0400 Discovery of cellular process could impact the understanding of cancer and aging
AI 模型增强了癌症患者免疫相关不良事件的检测虽然免疫检查点抑制剂 (ICIs) 可以为癌症患者提供挽救生命的治疗，但它们也被发现会导致免疫相关不良事件 (irAE) -；副作用几乎可以不同程度地影响身体的每个器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/AI-model-enhances-detection-of-immune-lated-adverse-events-in-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/AI-model-enhances-detection-of-immune-lated-adverse-events-in-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f098082-03f5-456a-bf47-624ba723a39c Tue, 03 Sep 2024 23:03:16 -0400 AI model enhances detection of immune-related adverse events in cancer patients
PQBP3 蛋白被发现在衰老和大脑疾病中发挥关键作用2024 年 8 月 5 日在线发表在《EMBO 杂志》上的一项最新研究中，日本东京医科齿科大学 (TMDU) 的研究人员通过关注单个核仁蛋白的作用，揭开了这一谜题的关键部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/PQBP3- Protein-found-to-play-key-role-in-aging-and-brain-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/PQBP3- Protein-found-to-play-key-role-in-aging-and-brain-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba878059-3d2d-4bca-93b9-021f3320c663 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 22:59:00 -0400 PQBP3 protein found to play key role in aging and brain disorders
肠道细菌途径与失眠风险直接相关研究揭示了特定肠道微生物代谢途径与失眠之间的因果关系，强调了改善睡眠质量的潜在治疗目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Gut-bacteria-pathways-directly-linked-to-insomnia-risk-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Gut-bacteria-pathways-directly-linked-to-insomnia-risk-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40041304-5cbe-4e01-9a36-2d56d09d1de7 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 22:57:00 -0400 Gut bacteria pathways directly linked to insomnia risk identified
